law.text: The Commissioner shall promulgate administrative regulations to carry out KRS 247.6040 to 247.6070, and may establish monetary penalties for violating KRS 247.6040 to 247.6070 or for violating administrative regulations promulgated under KRS 247.6040 to 247.6070.
law.history: Created 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 79, sec. 5, effective June 26, 2007.
